title: Preparing for the Exit
itunes:title: Preparing for the Exit
description: As we continue our “mini-series” on Brexit, we’re recapping everything that’s happened since we recorded part one and discussing what we can expect to see in the coming weeks as companies prepare for the planned exit date of March 29.
content:encoded: As we continue our “mini-series” on Brexit, we’re recapping everything that’s happened since we recorded part one and discussing what we can expect to see in the coming weeks as companies prepare for the planned exit date of March 29.
itunes:subtitle: As we continue our “mini-series” on Brexit, we’re recapping everything that’s happened since we recorded part one and discussing what we can expect to see in the coming weeks as companies prepare for the planned exit date of March 29.
itunes:author: Deloitte US
